snippet: The Red Bulls and Arsenal on Friday completed details on a loan deal in which Thierry Henry will return to the north London club through mid-February.
abstract: The Red Bulls and Arsenal on Friday completed details on a loan deal in which Thierry Henry will return to the north London club through mid-February.
lead_paragraph: The Red Bulls of Major League Soccer announced Friday morning that they had completed the terms of an agreement that will send striker Thierry Henry to Arsenal of the English Premier League through the middle of February.

headline.main: Arsenal and Red Bulls Complete Henry Loan Deal
